Callback4Header: Slay the tormented spirit of Corik Trost
Name: Cries of Innocence
Phase0Description:
I met a grieving father who is haunted by visions of his dead son.

I must enter the Black Asylum and destroy the tormented spirit of Corik Trost.
Phase13Description: I should return to Vendral Trost and inform him that I have released the vengeful spirit of his son.
Toast: The tormented spirit of a Black Asylum inmate reaches out for company.
